entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who has a scar and is experiencing strange occurrences.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: A dark wizard who is mentioned as having an impact on Harry's mood.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is teaching Occlumency to Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend and a student at Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Harry is sensitive to Voldemort's mood.
Harry is a student of Snape, learning Occlumency from him.
Harry confides in Hermione about his experiences.
